laboratory_examinations.findings: Lipase level is 1120, which is outside the normal range.

No focal liver mass, smooth liver contour, common bile duct dilated at 7 mm with a stent identified, no intrahepatic biliary dilation, no stones or gallbladder wall thickening, normal spleen size (10 cm), and hypoechoic mass corresponding to necrotic lymph node.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Found 3.4 cm necrotic lymph node similar to prior imaging.
